timeline.message: Modify PartnerSupplychainLink grid views to merge partnerSupplychainLinkType fields and viewers into one target-name field

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this supposed to be link1Name here ?
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -14,17 +14,17 @@
 	<grid model="com.axelor.apps.base.db.PartnerSupplychainLink"
 		title="Supply chain links" editable="true"
 		name="partner-supplychain-link-partner-1-grid">
-		<field name="partnerSupplychainLinkType" form-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-form" grid-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-grid"/>
-		<field name="partnerSupplychainLinkType.link2Name" form-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-form" grid-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-grid"/>
+    <field name="partnerSupplychainLinkType" form-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-form"
+           grid-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-grid" target-name="link2Name"/>
 		<field name="partner2"/>
 	</grid>
 
 	<grid model="com.axelor.apps.base.db.PartnerSupplychainLink"
 		title="Supply chain links" editable="true"
 		name="partner-supplychain-link-partner-2-grid">
 		<field name="partner1"/>
-		<field name="partnerSupplychainLinkType" form-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-form" grid-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-grid"/>
-		<field name="partnerSupplychainLinkType.link1Name" form-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-form" grid-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-grid"/>
+    <field name="partnerSupplychainLinkType" form-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-form"
+           grid-view="partner-supplychain-link-type-grid" target-name="link2Name"/>

timeline.message: Add missing form and grid view and add domain on partner to get only customers
